reviewText:
Looks to be a bootleg but the quality is good enough. The second movie Bloodlust have only the english audio and not the japanese version but that is ok. Cover art is a copy from a from a original Vampire D Blood DVD you can see it is a photo copy. For the price it is worth it.
M
Grew up with it.  Came 3 days early in the mail.  Had both movies on 1 disc.
The seller gave me one hell of a bargain. It arrived a few days ahead of schedule, the quality is great. I highly recommend the seller to anyone.

Very happy with this purchase. Was definitely worth it. The video quality is pretty good. Sound is great, disc came in with nothing wrong with it and of course you do get to have your options of Japanese or English. I actually usually prefer the Japanese voice cast on most anime but if I do come across some that sound good with english voices I'll watch it that way. The English voices sounded good on this one. Only watched the first movie but I'm sure the second will be fine too since they are both on the same disc
Excellent movie from my past, plus it comes with Bloodlust which was a great bonus!
Awesome! Classic anime at its finest!
